item.guild.profession_licence.descriptio: Grants access to quests of the profession.
Use while sneaking to obtain a Profession Resignment.
item.guild.profession_licence.licence.su: You can now accept quests of the %s profession
item.guild.profession_licence.licence.fa: You already are a member of the %s profession
item.guild.profession_licence.missing_re: You do not meet the requirements for the %s profession
item.guild.profession_licence.too_many_p: You can have a maxium of %d professions at a time
item.guild.profession_licence.introducti: Congratulations on becoming a member of the Guild! You can now accept and complete quests through the Guild GUI (J by default) from everywhere you are, thanks to cutting edge End technology! Completing quests will grant you fame, giving you access to elite quests and prestige professions. May luck follow you on your journey adventurer!
item.guild.profession_resignment.resignm: You are not currently a member of the %s profession
lang.guild.errors: Cannot open the Guild screen because of the following datapack errors:
lang.guild.errors_info: To proceed please correct or remove the faulty datapacks, then use the /reload command.
profession.missing:
You need a profession before opening the Guild screen.
Go visit the Guild Master!
profession.level_up: You have reached level %d in the %s profession!
profession.unlocked_rewards: New quests will now have the chance of containing the following rewards:
profession.unlocked_tasks: New quests will now have the chance of containing the following tasks:
screen.guild.quests.build.description: Place the specified blocks to build a structure.
screen.guild.quests.cure.description: Heal the creature back to its original form.
screen.guild.quests.item.description: Obtain the requested item to progress with the quest.
screen.guild.quests.item.description2: Items will get automatically delivered on quest completition.
screen.guild.quests.quest_expiration.des: Available quests expire after %d minutes if left unaccepted.
screen.guild.quests.slay.description: Slay the requested entity to progress with the quest.
screen.guild.quests.time_available.descr: Complete a quest within its available time to get the full reward.
Expired quests can still be completed but with a lesser reward.
Use the Luck effect to get a bonus roll on the lesser reward.
text.autoconfig.guild.title: The Guild's configuration
